availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Enrolled Militia Records 1864 - 1865 ; Adair, Allen, Boyle, Daviess, Garrard, Owen, Pendleton, and Shelby counties
msIdentifier.idno: Flat Box 7, Folder 863-65 GARRARD COUNTY CORRESPONDENCE PERTAINING TO COMMISSIONS 7th Rgt Ky Militia

body.p:
"Duplicate"
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Frankfort, June 7th 1864.
The resignation of the following named officer is accepted to take effect from May 29th 1864

George H Dobyns
Col 7th Regt E. M. Garrard Co

By command of the Governor:
John Boyle
Adjutant General of Kentucky.

Report from Adjt Genl office
Special Order No 41
accepting the resignation of Geo. H. Dobyns Col 7th regt E M Garrard Co
Recorded
Recd I. G. O. June 7th 1864 J. B. L.
